term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - absolute electrode potential
term.title: absolute electrode potential

item.text: The electrode potential of a metal measured with respect to a universal reference system (not including any additional metal/solution interface).

sources.item: PAC, 1986, 58, 955. 'The absolute electrode potential: an explanatory note (Recommendations 1986)' on page 957 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198658070955)
